page.title: 08Types of Houses
page.content: To the west of our study area lies the edge of Tonbridge.The housing here is quite modern nearly all being built this century.There are detached,semi- detached and terraced houses,bungalows and a few flats.Some are privately owned and some are council houses belonging to the local authority. In Hadlow and Golden Green the housing is again a mixture of private and local authority.Unlike the Tonbridge area a number of these houses are quite old.The environmental architectural and historic importance of Hadlow was recognised by the local authority who designated a large part of it as a conservation area. Our area has a number of unusual buildings that have been or are being converted into homes including a chapel,barns,oast houses,a brewery and even a castle.
